action.action-desc: Mrs. Rodgers of Washington introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the cap on additional retired pay for extraordinary heroism for members of the Army and Air Force who served during the Vietnam Era.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bobby Moran Soldier’s Medal Retirement Act.

section.header: Elimination of cap on additional retired pay for extraordinary heroism for members of the Army and Air Force who served during the Vietnam Era
section.text: Title 10, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 1402(f)(2), by striking The amount and inserting Except in the case of a member who served during the Vietnam Era (as that term is defined in section 12731 of this title), the amount;
in section 7361(a)(2), by inserting (except in the case of a member who served during the Vietnam Era, as that term is defined in section 12731 of this title) after based; and
in section 9361(a)(2), by inserting (except in the case of a member who served during the Vietnam Era, as that term is defined in section 12731 of this title) after based.
